title: ESCAPING THE POLITICAL A Conversation With Rupert Read (2)
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: In the second part of my conversation with Rupert Read we cover private language, essential contestability and political ideologies.  We also discuss if it is possible to escape political ideologies or the use of power:  Can we carve out true friendships separate from the forms of oppression that surround us?
itunes:subtitle: In the second part of my conversation with Rupertâ€¦
